maple: A006332:=-2*(1+z)*(z**2+6*z+1)/(z-1)**7; # conjectured by _Simon Plouffe_ in his 1992 dissertation
mathematica: Table[(n (1 + n)^2 (2 + n) (1 + 2 n) (3 + 2 n))/90, {n, 0, 30}] (* or *){0}~Join~CoefficientList[Series[2 (x + 1) (x^2 + 6 x + 1)/(1 - x)^7, {x, 0, 29}], x] (* _Michael De Vlieger_, Mar 26 2016 *)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
